lead_paragraph: GREENBERG--Kenneth Alan, M.D. Beloved husband of Barbara Safran, adored father of Rachel and Daniel, loving son of Carole and Herbert Greenberg, cherished brother of Marc and Robert and devoted uncle, passed away on January 31st. Services on Thursday, February 4th, 11am at Congregation Shir Shalom, Ridgefield, CT. 1/3

headline.main: Paid Notice: Deaths  GREENBERG, KENNETH ALAN
